fullText: The wit operates on many levels in the musical “& Juliet,” starring Lorna Courtney, at the Stephen Sondheim Theater in Manhattan.
dtliExcerpt: The wit operates on many levels in the musical “& Juliet,” starring Lorna Courtney, at the Stephen Sondheim Theater in Manhattan.
showScoreExcerpt: "Jukebox musicals may still be bottom feeders, but, as '& Juliet' proves, there are sometimes small treasures to be found in the murk."
